title: Bard Chroma bug
body: Yesterday I was playing Bard in a match and wanted to get the Chroma skin pack. My HUD and other details around my item slots and character portrait were crisp and clear. I got the Chroma pack and chose the Ivy green Bard skin to play with. When I got into the match, my HUD was blurry, the gold coin icon looked like a yellow blur. It was difficult to see my teams portraits in the right and see when they had their ult up. When I levels up, my ability icons became distorted and patchy. Anyone else have this going on?

replies.body:
Hi Psycho Chris 92! 

Thanks for the report! Are you noticing this in every game, or did this only happen once?
